cells.title: Figside
cells.text: 将在 Figma 中的设计直接生成网站（需要使用到作者提供的模板）。我生成了一个，流程还挺简单的。
cells.text-en: Figside allows you to ship websites with Figma. Thanks to this plugin you can easily add Web behaviours like responsive grid, layout max/min height and width, navigation between Figma pages and more!
cells.author: Figside

cells.title: Voronoi
cells.text: 很有意思的生成类插件。在一个 Frame 里添加一些圆形，然后运行插件后，它会帮你生成一个叫 Voronoi 的图形。
cells.text-en: Generate a Voronoi diagram from a single frame containing one or more ellipses.
cells.author: Sean O'Shea

cells.title: Figma Measure
cells.text: 类似于 Redline，不过这个插件比较好玩的地方是，它的标注是跟随者界面元素变化的。
cells.text-en: A plugin for easy measurement of sizes. The simple user interface allows you to add easily redlines for heights and widths, fill spaces, measure distances between elements and more.
cells.author: Phil

cells.title: Spottie
cells.text: 有点类似 Youtube Cover 那个插件，只不过这个是插入 Spotify 里的专辑和曲目的封面。
cells.text-en: Insert album and track covers from Spotify into your designs.
cells.author: Nathakit Sae-Tan

cells.title: Insight Hunter
cells.text: 更像是一个提供网页设计灵感的插件。插件里有根据不同行业来分类的好看的网站链接。
cells.text-en: The largest database of website references categorized by industry! Quickly find references from the industry you need and add them to your pitch.
cells.author: Insight Hunter

cells.title: Replace Nodes
cells.text: 复制一个元素的，然后直接粘贴替换掉你想要被替换掉的元素。非常好用的一个小插件。
cells.text-en: replaces selected nodes with the copied node. Basically this plugin does paste over selection while removing the original selection.
cells.author: Stas Haas

cells.title: Looper Legacy
cells.text: 作者 Fork 了之前介绍过的 Looper，算是它的升级版——将选中的元素，生成特定的重复效果。
cells.text-en: It's a Figma plugin for creating trippy generated graphics. Works with any Vector, Shape or Text layer.
cells.author: Stas Haas

cells.title: Fig3D
cells.text: 将图形转换成 3D 模型，然后实时预览并插入到 Figma。
cells.text-en: Instantly convert your shapes, icons, logos and UI designs to 3D models and get a good render. All in Figma.
cells.author: Palash Bansal

cells.title: Moodz
cells.text: 创建 Moodboard 的一个辅助工具——将图片拖入 Figma ，然后这个工具会帮你将图片排列好。
cells.text-en: Moodz is the easiest way to organize your inspiration. It’s as easy to use as 1,2,3.
cells.author: Milkshake Studio

cells.title: Pop a Component
cells.text: 选中一个元素，然后直接创建组件的同时，在原位置生成一个 Instance。
cells.text-en: Speed up your component workflow. This plugin turns the selected layers into a component, leaving behind an instance in place.
cells.author: Nathan Manousos

cells.title: Lucide Icons
cells.text: 作者在 Feather Icon 的基础上拓展了一些图标。
cells.text-en: An open-source icon library, a fork of Feather Icons.We're expanding the icon set as much as possible while keeping it nice-looking.
cells.author: Eric Fennis
